roleset.name: call before court to answer indictment
roleset.note: ARRAIGN-V NOTES: Frame file created by Arrick. No Verbnet entry, Comparison with 'indict'. (from arraign.01-v)

example.name: no legal authority
example.text: Just hours ago [this man]-1 was arraigned [*]-1 for the brutal murder of graduate student Imette St. Guillen.
example.arg: for the brutal murder of graduate student Imette St. Guillen.
